verses.verse: ([A Psalm of] Praise, of David.) I will extol <S%H7311><s%> Thee, my God, <S%H430><s%> O King; <S%H4428><s%> And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Thee, And I will praise <S%H1984><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and highly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> And His greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable. <S%H369><s%> <S%H2714><s%>
One generation <S%H1755><s%> shall praise <S%H9576><s%> Thy works <S%H4639><s%> to another, <S%H1755><s%> And shall declare <S%H5046><s%> Thy mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts. <S%H1369><s%>
On the glorious <S%H9202><s%> splendor <S%H1926><s%> of Thy majesty, <S%H1935><s%> And on Thy wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works, <S%H6381><s%> I will meditate. <S%H7878><s%>
And men shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the power <S%H5807><s%> of Thine awesome <S%H3372><s%> acts; <S%H3372><s%> And I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of Thy greatness. <S%H1420><s%>

They shall eagerly <S%H5042><s%> utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of Thine abundant <S%H7227><s%> goodness, <S%H2898><s%> And shall shout <S%H7442><s%> joyfully <S%H7442><s%> of Thy righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful; <S%H7349><s%> Slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> in lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all, <S%H3605><s%> And His mercies <S%H7356><s%> are over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His works. <S%H4639><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> Thy works <S%H4639><s%> shall give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And Thy godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> Thee.
They shall speak <S%H1696><s%> of the glory <S%H9202><s%> of Thy kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> And talk <S%H1696><s%> of Thy power; <S%H1369><s%>

To make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> Thy mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts, <S%H1369><s%> And the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the majesty <S%H1926><s%> of Thy kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>
Thy kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> And Thy dominion <S%H4475><s%> [endures] throughout all <S%H3605><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> sustains <S%H5564><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who fall, <S%H5307><s%> And raises <S%H2210><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> who are bowed <S%H3721><s%> down. <S%H3721><s%>
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> look <S%H7663><s%> to Thee, And Thou dost give <S%H5414><s%> them their food <S%H400><s%> in due time. <S%H6256><s%>
Thou dost open <S%H6605><s%> Thy hand, <S%H3027><s%> And dost satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing. <S%H2416><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> His ways, <S%H1870><s%> And kind <S%H2623><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> His deeds. <S%H4639><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> who call <S%H7121><s%> upon Him, To all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon Him in truth. <S%H571><s%>
He will fulfill <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him; He will also hear <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H7775><s%> and will save <S%H3467><s%> them.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> keeps <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who love <S%H157><s%> Him; But all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> He will destroy. <S%H8045><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> His holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
